message.original: ブリアの浜辺をマスターと並んで歩くのって なんだか素敵――ふふ
message.translation: Walking alongside the beach of Breya with you, Master is somewhat calming.

message.original: 難破船があったら乗り込んでみない？ ちょっとしたモノが見つかるかも――
message.translation: Why not explore the shipwrecks? We may find something.

message.original: 潮風が強いと少し髪がねとつくわ 日陰が少ないから肌も焼けちゃうし
message.translation: When the sea breeze is strong, my hair tends to get tangled. Because there is very little shade, I tend to get sunburn.

message.original: たまには海岸で貝殻拾いや ただのお散歩もいいですね 冒険にも多少のゆとりがなくっちゃ
message.translation: Sometimes I enjoy taking walks on the beach and picking up seashells. However the adventure has little room for it.

message.original: 灯台があると、船にも人にも 旅する者にとってはよき標になりますね
message.translation: With the lighthouse, it will mark safe passage for ships and sailors who travel here.
